name: Hot Dogs Brawl
description:
Hot Dogs Brawl

It's a game made in 48 hours for the #hotdogjam2017,take control of a hot dog whose only mission is to provide the extreme pleasure and an awesome taste to the customers. There will be competence though, other hot dogs are running towards the customer tray.

Fight them! and prove that you are the only one worth it, fulfill your destiny.

Instructions

Playable only with keyboard

  • A/D: Move Left/Right
  • K: Throw a punch
  • Enter: Navigate through menues
